mapper.select: SELECT s.*, a.ac_name, hr.emp_name FROM sale s LEFT JOIN human_resource hr ON hr.emp_id = s.emp_id LEFT JOIN accounts a ON a.ac_id = s.ac_id
mapper.insert: insert into sale (emp_id, ac_id, order_date, due_date, total_price, status) values (#{emp_id}, #{ac_id}, #{order_date}, #{due_date}, #{total_price}, #{status})
